distroi.auxiliary package

Subpackage containing auxiliary modules, mostly used for reading and analising data. Some modules are originally written by A. Corporaal and J. Kluska.

Submodules

  • distroi.auxiliary.beam module
  • distroi.auxiliary.read_oifits module
  • distroi.auxiliary.select_data_oifits module
  • distroi.auxiliary.time_base_oifits module
